value.title: The Hardest Mission EVER | Wings of Liberty NIGHTMARE DIFFICULTY Part 11 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: My first try at Nightmare Difficulty Mode StarCraft 2 Campaign created by GiantGrantGames and his amazing modding community. Having lots of fun with it! Here's the 11th part containing:  0:00 Stop sniping my good units! 0:07 In Utter Darkness  Here's a guide on how to play nightmare mode: https://www.reddit.com/r/StarcraftCampaigns/comments/tcxzii/wings_of_liberty_nightmare_difficulty/
